goals.active: Storm the Arcane Eye's hidden base to rescue Professor Gorr.
goals.complete: I joined Crusader Slep in storming the Arcane Eye's hidden base where they were holding Professor Gorr captive. Rakt's agents put up a fight, but we defeated them and got Gorr out. Now we're headed back to Rata Sum to present Gorr to Zojja and the other order reps for debriefing.

goals.active: Confer with Zojja and the other order reps.
goals.complete: Free once more, Professor Gorr was still determined to prove his theory about the Elder Dragons eating magic. After I conferred with Zojja and the order reps, I agreed to protect Gorr from Rakt and the Arcane Eye while he collects the data he needs to verify his claims.
